resources.string: In this application , users will reach various of surf boards. Each surf board has his own unique properties . This properties are shown in detailly . Users can add surf boards which they like to cart . Surf bards are listed in the cart tab. With share button above this text , you can share application name with your friends . Users can go to main page after clicked the button below these texts .

A surfboard is a narrow plank used in surfing. Surfboards are relatively light, but are strong enough to support an individual standing on them while riding an ocean wave. They were invented in ancient Hawaii, where they were known as papa he\'e nalu in the Hawaiian language, they were usually made of wood from local trees, such as koa, and were often over 460 cm in length and extremely heavy. Major advances over the years include the addition of one or more fins (skegs) on the bottom rear of the board to improve directional stability, and numerous improvements in materials and shape.

In this page , there is a information about how profile page works . Firstly , if you enter profile page for first time , an account will be created . And random name will be given to this account . However user can update and set his name to the app . This name will saved locally with SQLiteDatabase . This information do not lost if you exit the application . You can see your name in profile page every time enter the application .
There is no ios version of this app yet.
